autoFocus.description: If `true`, the pin input receives focus on mount
autoFocus.name: autoFocus

value.description:
The value of the the pin input. This is the value
that will be returned when the pin input is filled
value.name: value

defaultValue.description: The default value of the pin input
defaultValue.name: defaultValue

onComplete.description: Function called when all inputs have valid values
onComplete.name: onComplete

placeholder.description: The placeholder for the pin input
placeholder.name: placeholder

manageFocus.description: If `true`, focus will move automatically to the next input once filled
manageFocus.name: manageFocus

otp.description:
If `true`, the pin input component signals to its fields that they should
use `autocomplete="one-time-code"`.
otp.name: otp

id.name: id

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the pin input component is put in the disabled state
isDisabled.name: isDisabled

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the pin input component is put in the invalid state
isInvalid.name: isInvalid

type.description: The type of values the pin-input should allow
type.name: type

mask.description: If `true`, the input's value will be masked just like `type=password`
mask.name: mask
